description: The Great Barrier Reef of Queensland is one of the great reservoirs of marine and animal life. This documentary shows in detail, the birds, fish and mammals of the area and the work being done by scientists in studying them. A long sequence deals with the life cycle of the turtle, another with the microscopic creatures of the sea.
